pageProps.body:
RunAI Play Store Listing

RunAI Play Store Listing

This note was generated with AI assistance.

Play Store listing content for RunAI - AI Running Coach app.

Short Description (80 characters max)

Your personal AI running coach. Analyzes runs, creates plans, learns with you.

Full Description

The only coach who will stay with you forever.

RunAI is your personal AI running coach that gets smarter with every run. Unlike generic training apps or expensive human coaches, RunAI learns YOUR specific patterns, adapts to YOUR life, and provides honest feedback you can trust.

How it works:

  1. Connect your Strava account (or upload runs manually)
  2. Chat with your AI coach about your running goals
  3. Get personalized training plans through natural conversation
  4. Receive specific, honest feedback on every workout
  5. Watch your coach learn and improve with you over time

Key Features:

üèÉ Personalized AI Coaching

  • Analyzes your pace, heart rate, splits, and training patterns
  • Provides honest, constructive feedback (not generic motivation)
  • Learns what works for YOUR body over 20-30 runs
  • Adapts training based on your feedback and life circumstances

üìä Detailed Run Analysis

  • View complete run metrics: distance, pace, heart rate, elevation, cadence, power
  • Split-by-split breakdowns for structured workouts
  • Track performance trends over time
  • Add notes and RPE ratings to runs

üóìÔ∏è Conversational Training Plans

  • Generate weekly plans by chatting with your coach
  • Personalized workouts: easy runs, tempo, intervals, long runs
  • Automatic plan adjustments based on how workouts feel
  • Track planned vs. completed runs

üîó Seamless Strava Integration

  • One-tap authentication with Strava
  • Automatic run syncing (no manual uploads)
  • Works with any Strava-connected device or app

üí¨ Always Available

  • Chat 24/7 with your AI coach
  • Ask questions about training, recovery, race strategy
  • Get run-specific analysis anytime
  • Build long-term coaching relationship

Why RunAI?

Unlike cookie-cutter training apps, RunAI builds genuine understanding of YOUR running. The more you use it, the smarter it gets about your patterns, preferences, and what makes you improve.

Unlike human coaches ($50-100/session), RunAI costs just $10-12/month and is available anytime you need guidance.

Perfect for:

  • Serious amateur runners training for races
  • Athletes who want affordable, personalized coaching
  • Runners who value honest feedback over motivational fluff
  • Anyone who wants a coach that learns and improves over time

Pricing:

  • Free tier: Basic run stats and limited chat
  • Premium: Unlimited AI coaching - $10-12/month or $95/year
  • 30-day free trial included

Get started today and experience coaching that compounds with you.

RunAI integrates with Strava. Powered by Strava.

Keywords (for ASO - App Store Optimization)

Primary: running coach, AI coach, training plan, running app, Strava Secondary: marathon training, running tracker, pace calculator, workout planner, run analysis, personalized training, running feedback, race preparation

What's New (for updates)

  • Official Strava branding integration
  • RevenueCat subscription support with 30-day free trial
  • Improved chat interface
  • Bug fixes and performance improvements

Screenshot Suggestions (5+ required)

  1. Chat with Coach - Show conversation creating a weekly training plan
  2. Run Analysis - Display detailed run metrics with splits
  3. Training Plan - Calendar view of planned workouts
  4. Strava Integration - "Connect with Strava" button and seamless syncing
  5. Run History - List of past runs with key stats
  6. Personalized Feedback - AI coach analyzing a specific workout
  7. Settings/Profile - User profile with subscription status, "Powered by Strava" logo

App Icon

Current status: Needs finalization (check runai codebase for latest)

Category

Health & Fitness

Content Rating

Everyone

Privacy Policy Required

Yes - need to create privacy policy URL covering:

  • Data collection: Strava OAuth data, run metrics, chat history
  • Data usage: AI training analysis, coaching recommendations
  • Data sharing: RevenueCat for subscriptions, OpenAI/Anthropic for AI processing
  • Data retention: User controls, account deletion
  • User rights: Access, export, deletion

Action item: Create privacy policy document and host at runai.com/privacy or similar

Data Safety Form (Google Play)

Data collected:

  • Personal info: Name, email (from Strava)
  • Health & fitness: Run data (distance, pace, heart rate, GPS routes)
  • App activity: Chat history, training plans
  • App info: Subscription status

Data sharing:

  • Third-party services: Strava API, RevenueCat, AI providers (OpenAI/Anthropic)

Security practices:

  • Data encrypted in transit (HTTPS)
  • Users can request data deletion
  • Data not sold to third parties

Support & Contact

  • Website: TBD (need to set up)
  • Support email: TBD (create support@runai.app or similar)
  • Privacy policy: TBD

Promotional Text (170 characters - optional)

Your AI running coach that learns with you. Get personalized training plans, honest feedback, and smarter coaching over time. 30-day free trial.

Next Steps

  • Finalize app icon
  • Take 5-7 high-quality screenshots from app
  • Create privacy policy and host it
  • Set up support email address
  • Review and edit descriptions above
  • Translate to other languages (optional, later)

noteIndex.title: Notes
noteIndex.body:
Hi! I'm Param! This is a place for my personal notes.

My website is https://param.codes, and I write more readable
stuff on my substack: https://newsletter.param.codes.

I've found that taking notes helps me remember things, and it's nice
to look back on information that you processed years ago. I jot down random things, there's no real structure, but some of these
notes could eventually become blog posts.

Some notes you might find interesting:

- [[history.laphams_quarterly.democracy.campaign_finance]]
- [[engineering.being_a_mentor]]
- [[history.china.dynasties]]
- [[history.india.indira_gandhi]]

I also keep notes on books I read [[here|books]].

This is built using [[Dendron|engineering.dendron]] and hosted using
[GitHub Pages](https://github.com/paramsingh/notes).

Get in touch via [Twitter](https://twitter.com/iliekcomputers) or email me at `me [at] param [dot] codes`!
